description: Use a flavorful broth — chicken or vegetable — to enhance the subtle flavors in this thick, comforting soup, which uses lettuce as a main ingredient Rice thickens the soup and it’s all puréed with an immersion blender
title: Lettuce and Green Garlic Soup
title_page: Lettuce and Green Garlic Soup Recipe - NYT Cooking
